sentences.sContent: Then he drank strawberry juice through a straw.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then he drank strawberry juice through a straw.
sentences.sCn: 然后他用吸管喝了一些草莓果汁。

sentences.sContent: We have three flavors of ice-cream,vanilla chocolate and strawberry.
sentences.sContent_eng: We have three flavors of ice-cream,vanilla chocolate and strawberry.
sentences.sCn: 我们有三种口味的冰欺凌，香草，巧克力和草莓。

trans.tranOther: a soft red juicy fruit with small seeds on its surface, or the plant that grows this fruit
